mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence from Martin H. Holt at Chamborozo Hospital
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, January 5, 1862, from Martin H. Holt at Chamborozo Hospital, Richmond, Va. Subject: Mr. Holtâ€™s health. Also states that Sergeant Stigleman is very sick with mumps and is asking for money. 1 original piece.
